title: Tenosinovitis
creator_credit: Women's Film Unit and Film Australia
brief_description: Female sufferers of tenosynovitis describe how they became injured. They discuss the way that their injuries have affected their lives within the workforce and at home, where often they must perform all the domestic duties.
description: Female sufferers of tenosynovitis describe how they became injured. They discuss the way that their injuries have affected their lives within the workforce and at home, where often they must perform all the domestic duties.
